title: Executive Order 12713-Report Required by Section 502 of the Automotive Products Trade Act of 1965
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and laws of the United States of America, including the Automotive Products Trade Act of 1965 et seq.) ("Act"), and in order to provide for the submission to the Congress of the annual report required by section 502 of the Act it is hereby ordered that authority for submission of the report is delegated to the Secretary of Commerce.

George Bush
The White House,
May 1, 1990.
citation: George Bush, Executive Order 12713-Report Required by Section 502 of the Automotive Products Trade Act of 1965 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/269036
